author: TataPB
title: Most comfortable hotel
text: We had a great stay at The Halkin, with polite staff and incredible upgrade!! Loved it. Our room was specious and we love the Como Shambala amenities. It was my birthday, and when we arrived in our bedroom, the manager Andrew had provided a bday cake! What a pleasant surprise!
